Acura TL 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Acura TL 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Acura TL changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Acura TL 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

CarAndDriver Test Results

  • -Zero to 60 mph: 6.2 sec
  • -Zero to 100 mph: 15.4 sec
  • -Street start, 5-60 mph: 6.6 sec
  • -Standing ¼-mile: 14.7 sec @ 98 mph
  • -Top speed (governor limited): 125 mph
  • -Braking, 70-0 mph: 178 ft
  • -Roadholding, 300-ft-dia skidpad: 0.86 g
